name: 15 Light-Minutes Away
description:
This is a hand draw puzzle game where a small interplanetary rover needs to be programmed to perform some maneuvers.

As in real life, it takes some time to send a message to Mars and the real time control is not possible.

The Player needs to think ahead, imagine the path, fight the wind direction and capture special dirt on the way to the target destination.

The game also has a counter for speed runners, available at the high score panel.
